Sunsets at Pier 60

Home
>
About
About
For over 29 years, Sunsets at Pier 60 has been a cherished nightly festival celebrating the artistic and cultural spirit of Clearwater Beach. Held in Pier 60 Park, this iconic event showcases the talents of local artisans and street performers, creating a lively and engaging atmosphere for visitors and residents alike.
Operating two hours before to two hours after sunset each evening, weather permitting, the festival offers a unique blend of handcrafted treasures, captivating live entertainment, and stunning views of Clearwater Beach’s world-famous sunset.
of
Transcript
Frequently Asked Questions
What are your hours of operation?
Sunsets at Pier 60 operates year-round, weather permitting from 2 hours before until 2 hours after sunset. Current summer hours of operation are 4:00 p.m. - 8:00 p.m.
How do I become a participating artisan?
You may apply online at, http://sunsetsatpier60.com/p/artisans/artisan-application. A staff person will be in contact with you to follow-up regarding your application.
How do I become a participating buskers/street performer?
You may apply online at, http://sunsetsatpier60.com/p/buskers/busker-application. A staff person will be in contact with you to follow-up regarding your application.
Where does the nightly sunset celebration take place?
Sunsets at Pier 60 takes place in Pier 60 Park on Clearwater Beach.
Are pets allowed?
Animals are not permitted on Pier 60 or the bathing beaches on Clearwater Beach. Service dogs are permitted.
Are cameras permitted?
Yes! Take as many pictures as you would like, but don’t forget to post them on social media for everyone to see. Tag us on Facebook at @SunestsAtPier60DailyFestival and on Instagram and Twitter at @SunsetsAtPier60.
Where can I park?
Parking on Clearwater Beach doesn't need to be a treasure hunt! Parking can be found in multiple spots along the beach. Pay rates vary. For a complete list of all parking options and ParkMobile information, please click the below link!
https://www.myclearwater.com/government/city-departments/engineering/parking-system/beach-parking
